Reviews.Title: everything i expected
Reviews.Author: Kristen arrendell
Reviews.Content: Everything I expected it to be and it was on time. Love Canon and will be purchasing more in the future.

Reviews.Title: good camera
Reviews.Author: rogelio castillo
Reviews.Content: This camera has very good features and quality of a professional camera with a small size. It is very good

Reviews.Title: a good one for non-photographers :)
Reviews.Author: Pashew
Reviews.Content: the bag was too bad, resisted for only two day-outs, no more.. the rest is very good, the camera works perfectly.

Reviews.Title: Wonderful gift
Reviews.Author: Misty Elder
Reviews.Content: Got this for my mother, and being this is a video and camera all in one is a huge bonus.

Reviews.Title: Uploading software is horrible
Reviews.Author: J. Dodge
Reviews.Content: Camera is fine, but it comes with the worst software ever for uploading photos to Facebook, Twitter etc. I returned it...very disappointed.

ProductInfo.Features:
12.1 Megapixel High-Sensitivity CMOS sensor
Canon DIGIC 4 Image Processor
1080p Full HD video
30x Optical Zoom and 24mm Wide-Angle lens
Optical Image Stabilizer
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX510 HS 12.1 MP CMOS Digital Camera with 30x Optical Zoom and 1080p Full-HD Video Premiere Bundle With 16GB Secure Digital High Capacity (SDHC) Memory Card, Digpro Compact Camera Deluxe Carrying Case, Extra Battery , Tripod
